name: Jimmy Smith
description:
'''James Oscar Smith''' (December 8, 1928 â€“ February 8, 2005) was an American [[jazz]] musician who helped popularize the [[Hammond organ|Hammond B-3]] organ, creating a link between jazz and 1960s [[soul music]].

In 2005, Smith was awarded the [[NEA Jazz Masters|NEA Jazz Masters Award]] from the National Endowment for the Arts, the highest honor that America bestows upon jazz musicians.
